sn4.5:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava baranasiyam viharati isipatane migadaye.
sn4.5:2.1: “Muttaham, bhikkhave, sabbapasehi ye dibba ye ca manusa.
sn4.5:2.2: Tumhepi, bhikkhave, mutta sabbapasehi ye dibba ye ca manusa.
sn4.5:2.3: Caratha, bhikkhave, carikam bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
sn4.5:2.5: Desetha, bhikkhave, dhammam adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakasetha.
sn4.5:2.6: Santi satta apparajakkhajatika, assavanata dhammassa parihayanti.
sn4.5:2.8: Ahampi, bhikkhave, yena uruvela senanigamo tenupasankamissami dhammadesanaya”ti.
sn4.5:2.9: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
